description:
Sure-footed traction in the most extreme mountain environments. The geometry offers solid floation in soft snow, and the Energy Saver pivot bar provides lateral rigidity when traversing steep slopes. Great for mountaineering or off-trail snowshowing in the backcountry.

  • Lightweight AeroLite frames are sturdy and provide 360-degree traction
  • Durable Entech decking offers great floation in deep snow and stays supple down to -50°C
  • Spin binding ratcheting cable cinches down with a quick twist
  • Large-toothed front crampons dig into powder and hard snow
  • Aggressive rear crampons provide traction on traverses and descents
  • Heel lifts for comfort and efficiency when going uphill
name: GV Snowshoes Mountain Extreme SPIN Snowshoes - Men's
